statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 5 \\ 5 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
